text: Balsillie may refer to: ==People with the surname== * James Laurence "Jim" Balsillie (Canadian businessman and philanthropist) * John Graeme "Graeme" Balsillie (pioneer of wireless telegraphy in Australia) * Mary Anne Balsillie (Canadian politician) ==People with the given name== * William Balsillie Small (Scottish trade unionist) ==Businesses including the name== Balsillie School of International Affairs (Centre for research into global governance and international public policy)
title: Balsillie
